title: Shaw Meets Harold (Person of Interest)(2 x 16)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: This moment really sells Finch as the Shadow Master, the unknowable entity.  In another show, Shaw would be the protaganist and this moment would be a great reveal of an enigmatic Harold who knewe what she was fighting against but refused to give her more details.  I love this scene.
Shaw and Root were so hot. I'm glad I'm bi
The beginning of the the machines acolytes.
Be funnier if he gave her his social as his number
description:
Shaw meets and talks with Harold
